[**Theorem -**]{} Let $V$ be a topological vector space over
$\mathbb{R}$ or $\mathbb{C}$. Then $V$ is if and only if the topology of
$V$ is a family of seminorms.

Moreover, $V$ is Hausdorff and locally if and only if the topology of
$V$ is a family of seminorms.
